### isADDADDMUL() {#a587fabf73d3c7f427d22ce7ad0af6dc1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static bool isADDADDMUL (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> Op, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp; Mul0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp; Mul1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp; Addend0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp; Addend1, bool requireIntermediatesHaveOneUse)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
isADDADDMUL - Return whether <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> is in a form that is equivalent to add(add(mul(x,y),a),b).

If requireIntermediatesHaveOneUse is true then each intermediate result in the calculation must also have a single use. If the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> is in the correct form the constituent parts are written to Mul0, Mul1, Addend0 and Addend1.

<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// isADDADDMUL - Return whether Op is in a form that is equivalent to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// add(add(mul(x,y),a),b). If requireIntermediatesHaveOneUse is true then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// each intermediate result in the calculation must also have a single use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If the Op is in the correct form the constituent parts are written to Mul0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Mul1, Addend0 and Addend1.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570" lineLink="#a587fabf73d3c7f427d22ce7ad0af6dc1"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#a587fabf73d3c7f427d22ce7ad0af6dc1">isADDADDMUL</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;Mul0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;Mul1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;Addend0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;Addend1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> requireIntermediatesHaveOneUse)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getOpcode() != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> N0 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getOperand(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> N1 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>.getOperand(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> AddOp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> OtherOp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (N0.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AddOp = N0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OtherOp = N1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (N1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a269996b43a1f3e1d1f84a70fd4387535">ISD::ADD</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AddOp = N1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OtherOp = N0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (requireIntermediatesHaveOneUse &amp;&amp; !AddOp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a342c0d4e8e59b30daefe9a05bc2098bd">hasOneUse</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OtherOp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ae779a9d142e6318d8fb0e4f0da32af0f">getOpcode</a>() == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110ad8aec9273962cf78d087090c11a1dd1c">ISD::MUL</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add(add(a,b),mul(x,y))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (requireIntermediatesHaveOneUse &amp;&amp; !OtherOp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a342c0d4e8e59b30daefe9a05bc2098bd">hasOneUse</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Mul0 = OtherOp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a977e54da724d62e7b08e2ad69723731e">getOperand</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Mul1 = OtherOp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a977e54da724d62e7b08e2ad69723731e">getOperand</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Addend0 = AddOp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a977e54da724d62e7b08e2ad69723731e">getOperand</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Addend1 = AddOp.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a977e54da724d62e7b08e2ad69723731e">getOperand</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OUTCHAIN = EH&#95;RETURN(INCHAIN, OFFSET, HANDLER)</span></CodeLine>
